alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 26 at 4:58PM MST until February 27 at 1:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 85 mph. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 1 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages will be possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft
